comments.content: I am trying to identify this script used on a greeting card. Thank you.
i could be delusional, but the repeaters seem different to me. handwritten.

Reminds me of [Laura Worthington](http://web.archive.org/web/20131005082446/http:/lauraworthingtontype.com/)'s work. Thought it could have been embedded in her [Greeting Cards](http://web.archive.org/web/20131005082446/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/greeting-cards) but unfortunately not. Anyway, even if it's a bit rough, [Alana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131005082446/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/alana) by the aforementioned Laura Worthington could be considered as a nice substitute.
